website_summaries.verdict: A strong, durable, and affordable ice fishing rod that is sure to serve you well for years to come.
pros: Ported aluminum spool offers immense versatility
EVA foam handle provides a comfortable grip
Sturdy enough to help anglers catch a wide range of small and jumbo fish, including bass, perch, and walleye
cons: Has a very soft tip, which may make it tough to feel when fish bite

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive rig
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to supplement my ultralight and med-heavy ice fishing poles this year. It is a GREAT middle of the road pole that is light enough to hook crappies and heavy enough to drag up legal lake trout without complaining. I caught a bunch of stocked browns and rainbows in Maryland and then caught a half dozen keeper lake trout in northern NYS too. Respool it with premium 6 pound fluoro line and you’ll be in good shape for whatever bites.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse B

customer_reviews.title: SENSITIVE BUT STRONG ENOUGH FOR LARGE HARD HITTING FISH!
customer_reviews.text: There is not a better ice pole for the money. These poles are strong but sensitive on the tip so you can see light nibbles when fish are either suspicious or not really hungry. I've caught fish over 5 pounds on the medium ugly stick ice pole and prefer it over most all poles I've used. I would not only refere a friend to this, but would refere this pole to you if you want a pole that is strong enough for hard hitting large fish, but want the sensitivity of a light action pole. Good luck and happy fishing!
customer_reviews.author: Lynard

customer_reviews.title: easily broken
customer_reviews.text: The fishing rod is really good, but it feels good just after the first two uses. It is about a month after I use this fishing rod for the third time and its reel is broken.
customer_reviews.author: samliu

customer_reviews.title: It’s an ugly stick, you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Although it is for ice fishing, works perfect for my 4 year old. He caught his first fish the first time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Rey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ice Combo
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is one of the best ice combos out there. It is smooth and durable and works very well. I have landed quite a few 1 pound trout on it and lifted them all out of the hole as high as I please without questioning the durability. It is sensitive enough to feel even some softer perch bites. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a solid, durable ice combo!
customer_reviews.author: JeronimoHIllam

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and flexible pole.
customer_reviews.text: This pole is awesome. I had so much fun bringing in redfish on this pole. The casting sucks but it is a ice fishing pole. I would recommend to everyone just for the fun of being that big fish in on the little rod.
customer_reviews.author: Darren dufrene jr

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, the reel isn't perfect but I only go ice fishing a handful of times per year, and until I go much more, this does everything I need!
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Not a medium action rod. More like a light action
customer_reviews.text: We all know ugly sticks are durable and for the price can’t beat it. But I will say I picked up the medium rod, it’s more like a light action rod. Not stiff enough to be considered medium by long shot. Rod is a better light action rod for pan fish. But wasn’t what I was looking for jogging heavier jigs for walleye in deep water. But rod is a nice combo and I’ll still be able to use it perch fishing n what not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good rod
customer_reviews.text: very good rod, the first time i used it (not ice fishing) i got a 2 lb bass. i got the 26" version which has a very soft tip, a little hard to feel the bite.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this rod last month, when it came in, the top of the rod was snapped, so I ordered a replacement rod. The replacement rod came in today. I didn’t even have to take the packaging off the replacement rod to see that the top of the replacement rod was snapped as well. I was very disappointed. I would’ve really enjoyed using it on my adventures and would have made it easier for me, but I guess that will not be happening :/
customer_reviews.author: Jesse P

customer_reviews.title: yet sturdy and flexible enough to bring up the jumbos
customer_reviews.text: Sensitive enough to catch the tiniest of fish, yet sturdy and flexible enough to bring up the jumbos. Best ice fishing rod ive ever had but only use it for perch, gills, crappie and other pan fish. I’ve pulled up bass and walleye with it too no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Preston

customer_reviews.title: It an Ugly Stick
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Ugly Stick, I have a 4'8" trout rod, a medium heavy for bass fishing, and know this little jig rod for ice fishing and I love them all. This ones is probably now my favorite. I've used it all season for togue and salmon fishing and can always feel when I have a fish playing with my bait. You really can't go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Galen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap ice fishing rod
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for a one day ice fishing trip with a friend of mine. A little spring broke for the drag clicker. Drag still worked just didn't make the clicking sound when pulling drag. Not a big deal, just a cheap rod. What i expected from a low quality fishing rod brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Kozlowski

customer_reviews.title: My favorite ice fishing pole.
customer_reviews.text: Have one of these in red myself and its my favorite ice fishing rod. Bought this one for my wife and she loves it. Very sensitive yet big enough to hold up to the occasional northern pike we catch pan fishing. The included reel is pretty good also.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good quality rod and feel combo for an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality rod and feel combo for an amazing price, I own too. I just wish the owner was better at finding fish...
customer_reviews.author: King Kong

customer_reviews.title: Excellent combo for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this rod/reel combo for walleye fishing (ice fishing) and it works well. Ugly Stick rods are just about unbreakable. You can't go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Romby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rod and reel - as always.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light weight rod for perch. Order the Med/Heavy if you think anything over 2 lbs is gonna hit. Like, you know, pickerel or bass.
customer_reviews.author: bzzh8c

customer_reviews.title: Bad drag on reel
customer_reviews.text: Ugly stick is a fine product, but.....the reel that came with my pole( combo unit )was Crap. The knob for the drag was stripped on and the reel and was useless. I didn’t know this until I was on the ice and putting line on. Lucky I had another pole in the truck, because they were bitting.
customer_reviews.author: dennis l jaworski

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Caught ton of perch and walleye on this setup. Well worth the money. My only complaint would be the reel feels a little flimsy. It help up though.
customer_reviews.author: Derek k

customer_reviews.title: Great combo for basic ice fishing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great combo for basic ice fishing. Can't beat it for the price. I liked it enough that I bought a second one. This is not super fancy but it will get the job done probably 90-plus percent of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Get a longer stiffer rod
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for my needs ice fishing perch... wish I did buy a longer stronger rod ... 28” would have been perfect. Hard to set hook.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN F OWENS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect second pole for my kayak.
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my kayak. It’s awesome for dropping a line over the side. Small enough to be out of the way when I want to cast.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeythefireman

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it yet but feels great..
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but feels great... Stiff 3/4 the way up then real sensitive at the tip... Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rod
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Sensitive enough to recognize bites and strong enough to find big fish. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hark

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing poles
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves this fishing pole. He buys ugly sticks for their durability and price. They don’t break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Very strong and reliable! Very fun.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my boyfriend for his ice fishing and he loves it! He had a different brand of rod and reel and the tip snapped like a twig after the first heavy northern pike. This one has reeled in dozens of northern pikes and white fish and still going strong. We will for sure order more in the future, LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Teeluk

customer_reviews.title: catches fish
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to. Used it for the whole last ice season and it worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little ice fishing rod, used several times for perch fishing on Lake Erie this winter. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Geiss

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My fisherman grandson loves this fishing pole and has had great success doing ice fishing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level ice fishing combo
customer_reviews.text: Good action and ugly stik durability. The reel is nicer than I thought it would be, with smooth drag and retrieve. Fitted with a spring bobber, it’ll do the trick for Kokanee and trout.
customer_reviews.author: B. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Good size, quality and item.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, but it hasn’t been used yet. So I’m not quite sure how it works. But when it arrived it was very good quality, and sturdy. It was a good price for the pole too. It’s the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie statz

customer_reviews.title: Great rod, adequate reel.
customer_reviews.text: The rod is amazing, very strong mid section for setting hooks but very sensative end for looking for bites and jigging precisely. The reel isnt anything special, I dont plan on it lasting forever but I suppose it doesnt need to be that nice for icefishing since the fish dont fight as hard.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely light action
customer_reviews.text: Very light action is what I was looking for. Just be aware that you can pretty much bend this pole in half its so light action.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Rod broke
customer_reviews.text: Hit a snag and the pole snapped in two. Not very durable. Ruined my fishing for the day.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Little too light.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little too sensitive compared to other light poles a decent perch will bend your pole in half. Also makes it hard to tell when one bites. They took the ultra light a little too seriously here.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Feels great so far, cant wait to get on the ice and try it our in real word conditions.
customer_reviews.text: Feels great so far, cant wait to get on the ice and try it our in real word conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Shakespeare’s ugly stick is one  tough critter
customer_reviews.text: Ugly stick by Shakespeare is the only type of Rod I will buy. Priced right great product . I am 74 years young I’ve been using Shakespeare ugly stick for at least 35 years would never go to any other fishing rod.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pole
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing about ice fishing ,a friend of mine did and had it ordered and my grown son was pretty impressed.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great pole
customer_reviews.text: Very sensitive pole, caught a lot of fish. I will be buying more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: mshef

customer_reviews.title: More than half of my rods are ugly sticks
customer_reviews.text: Just can't beat an ugly stick for the money. My favorite rod! I'll always use an ugly stick!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Got it for good casting for bass in tight places but works out great
customer_reviews.author: Harley Hatch

customer_reviews.title: I love these fishing pole combo.
customer_reviews.text: I love these fishing pole combo. I am going to them out this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t used it enough yet
customer_reviews.text: Great rod decent sensitivity, only used onece so far used for smaller pan fish up to medium walleye
customer_reviews.author: Dan diehl

customer_reviews.title: Ice fishing
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend ice fishes and likes a variety of rods so this is a nice addition to his collection.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy C

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod for A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I love Ugly Stik products. Very affordable yet durable. The light action rod with 4-6lb fluoro lands me big trout.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The rod is sensitive and still has the durability you've come to expect from an ugly stick. Could detect bites from bluegill without a spring bobber and held up to bass in between. The reel is decent for the price point but I will probably upgrade it when possible. Great starter combo for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good starter combo
customer_reviews.text: I like the ugly stick rods and reel combo,However too much line twist though and freeze up. May want to mate it up with the black Betty ice reel
customer_reviews.author: Vincent H.

customer_reviews.title: Broke my 2nd time using it.  One day past being able to return.
customer_reviews.text: Hope Amazon/vendor steps up here. Only used this twice. I could return this item up until 2/1/2020. Today is 2/2/2020. DO NOT BUY!!! COMPLETE GARBAGE!!!! The tip snapped off catching a 2 pound pickerel. Unreal!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Solid setup
customer_reviews.text: Solid rod and reel combo for everything from perch to the occasional pike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very, very, very fragile
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on a kayak trip for it's size. After the fourth cast, while reeling in I got hung on something under water. One pull to try and either dislodge the bait, and the too 8 inches of the pole snapped off. Needless to say, I didn't eat fish for dinner.
customer_reviews.author: M. Prejean

customer_reviews.title: great pole. very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: great pole. very sensitive. liked it so much its now my primary ice rod and i ordered another one right away
customer_reviews.author: Don C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rod. Caught five 18" cutthroat trout on it ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rod. Caught five 18" cutthroat trout on it the first day I used it and my buddy caught a 22" the same day. Great action and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Drhonest

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Never bought one before, it was a gift. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great ice fishing. Can't wait to use it this winter!
customer_reviews.author: lagoog

customer_reviews.title: Ice Fishing Rod & Reel
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my son. He really, really loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jonsey

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I love the rod. So-so on the real, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hedlund

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good rod but i broke it real easy so treat it well
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Whole ice rod arsenal now the  USGX2!
customer_reviews.text: Caught a 6lb. Cutbow first trip out liked everything about it bought two more!
customer_reviews.author: Ronin

customer_reviews.title: Nice rig at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice all around ice fishing rig with a good price. O put 6lb line on mine and have caught small gills to large bass with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wedll

customer_reviews.title: I found reel works great.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the nagatives about the reel. I found it to be ultra smooth and no backlash. Casts great. Lovin my ugly!
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Broken reel, replacement..broken reel ...QC issues
customer_reviews.text: Should be a zero star option. This is my second one in a row that the reel arrived broken. This is poor QC at its finest. The rod is great if the reel could arrive undamaged it would be wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: tracey

customer_reviews.title: I can tell is very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Well I bought it to late in the season but my first fishing rod and real was a Shakespeare on a ugly stick 40 some years ago and still have it. This rod and real combo,I can tell is very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Great ice fishing rod
customer_reviews.text: Great ice fishing rod!!!! I was actually out kayak fishing the other day and I thought I might as well try to troll with this rod and I saw the tip move instantly when a fish took it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, great product
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten a chance to use it yet but I'm excited to. It looks awesome and feels great in the hands. I love ugly sticks poles so I'm sure this ice fishing one will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Streff

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, the 2nd eye down from the tip looks to be about 30° off line from the other eye guides. QC needs to do a better job so that Shakespeare isn’t sending defective products to loyal paying customers.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mahala

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this rod. He has many, ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this rod. He has many, but when he takes his friends out no one else gets to use this pole.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod/Real
customer_reviews.text: Great combo for the price. Have got plenty of fish on this set up, Medium action is great!
customer_reviews.author: MrEyde

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good pole for the money, caught two walleye on it the first day with it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Chmela

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Everything i expected buying an ugly stik. Cant beat the quality at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The rod is great I went and bought a new one
customer_reviews.text: It looks good can’t wait to get some fish with it
customer_reviews.author: Chris fox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter pole.
customer_reviews.text: Held up catching up to below freezing temps and pulling in 14 to 18 inch fish. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: WW44

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: So much fun to use on 15" schoolie speckled trout! Casting crappie lures under lights on Texas coast, made me laugh out loud, so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Ice Rod
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase, rod was even more quality than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: MnWild

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love the rod the tip Is quite sensitive and still sets the hook hard I caught everything from Croppie to pike and the rod and Real did everything I needed it to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice job
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with how fast it was delivered to my house. Also with the quality of the product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rod/reel combo for the price, I purchased the 26 in and the rod is very sensitive . I use it for panfish on the ice. I would buy one again
customer_reviews.author: Lori T Higgins

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY with this rod/reel combo
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a cheaper, similar rod and that one broke. Then replaced the cheap rod with the Ugly Stik. VERY HAPPY with this new rod/reel combo. Don't waste your money on a cheap-o. You'll end up buying this one after the cheap-o breaks. The reel on this one is very, very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Need to order line as well
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Need to order line as well. Probably says that in the description somewhere but I didn't realize it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex V

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is horrible
customer_reviews.text: The rod showed up with the tip broken off. I’ve had this rod and reel combo in the past though and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Danoff

customer_reviews.title: Great rod.
customer_reviews.text: Ugly Sticks are the only fishing poles that I have caught oversized fish on in Alaska and didn’t have break.
customer_reviews.author: Frozen Buckeye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good pole. I'm going to get the longer one next.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very fast shipping and it got to me in one peice.
customer_reviews.author: dakota

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Design!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet on the field, but check out the spool and rod. everything looks durable and runs smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is great got a lot of fish so far great.
customer_reviews.author: i love my steton hatAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little pole!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ice fishing pole, my son loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it and has done plenty of ice fishing this winter!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthann D. Francis

customer_reviews.title: 3 times to get a Complete working item Waste of my time to return 2 back
customer_reviews.text: Shipping a broken pole isn’t what was described Wasteful time for sure.
customer_reviews.author: tim larson

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Caught a 23 in Walleye on this outfit......worked very well..good deal
customer_reviews.author: robert williams

customer_reviews.title: Great rod and reel
customer_reviews.text: Great rod and reel. I put it to the test with catching trout at 40ft. My only complaint was a few things were loose on reel. Tightened them up and it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod for $21
customer_reviews.text: 1st one shipped broken. Hoping the replacement is in tact. Seemed like a great value though
customer_reviews.author: MaRx

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great supplier, Fast shipping! Great setup, caught TONS with it already
customer_reviews.author: jonathan rochester

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy rod and reel combo!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of the spincast reel and rod combos and wanted to upgrade our son to an open face reel. I purchased the 30" combo. Pro's: - Was packaged well. -It is lightweight. -He is not able to cast it yet but has caught a few panfish and one spotted sea trout that was 15 inches. Con's: None as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Trista Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great little fishing pole!
customer_reviews.text: Told the wife I'm getting this for our 5 year old since it's small but will definitely use it for ice fishing! Our daughter does use it when we go camping and has caught numerous trout 10-14 inches long and the pole holds up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great rod for the money I’ve caught walleye and perch ...
customer_reviews.text: Great rod for the money I’ve caught walleye and perch it’s sensitive but has backbone to it . I own 2 now
customer_reviews.author: Megan Husk

customer_reviews.title: Best Rod Hands Down
customer_reviews.text: Lets be honest its an Ugly Stik I have done everything with these rods oversized line targeting fish way to big for the rods I was using have not broke one yet. My friend reeled in a 5 ft bog floating in a river with his ultra light paired with 50 lb spider wire I was sold on Ugly Stik after that.
customer_reviews.author: Anie R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little rod. Super sensitive at the tip. Feel every little nibble
customer_reviews.author: iownit

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, durable, and they work
customer_reviews.text: I love these rods, as they are durable, look good, and inexpensive. Great rod for a beginner or a seasoned fisherman.
customer_reviews.author: rideabiketoday

customer_reviews.title: Worst reel I’ve ever felt
customer_reviews.text: Worst reel I’ve ever felt. Wobbly and making grinding noises fresh out of the box. The reel is silly in my opinion, I should’ve just ordered the rod. Says prime took four days. Not happy. Probably gonna throw the reel out and get a cheap mitchel or something tbh. Sad to see Shakespeare quality falling to the wayside.
customer_reviews.author: Fish church llc

customer_reviews.title: Nice little ice rod for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice little ice rod for the price. Nice real solid rod can't beat an ugly stick With a stick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My nephew was extremely satisfied with the quality of this product. Great deal too!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D Kellar

product_meta.title: Shakespeare Ugly Stik GX2 Ice Fishing Reel & Rod Combo
product_meta.description: Ugly StikGX2 is the next generation of Ugly Stik that combines the heritage and tradition of the original while maintaining the strength and durability Ugly Stiks are known for. Ugly Stik GX2 rods offer better balance for lighter feel, improved components and eye catching cosmetics for a more modern look
feature_bullets: Size 20 spinning reel suited for ice applications
Genuine ugly Stik blank with clear tip design
Twist-lock reel seat with EVA handles
20 size spinning reel with 1 ball bearing
Ported aluminum spool for lighter weight and added durability
EVA handle with twist lock reel seat
